scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection contains three letters of James Fenimore Cooper letters: September 23, 1826 to Messrs. Gosselin, Meme, and Launay; May 1832 to Charles Gosselin; and November 15, 1845 to Messrs. Cowdin, Allen.

did.unittitle: Letter from James Fenimore Cooper to Messrs. Gosselin, Meme and Launay 23 September 1826

scopecontent.p: Cooper to Messrs. Gosselin, Meme and Launay, regarding French publication of Prairie. This is not found in James Franklin Beard's Letters and Journals of James Fenimore Cooper.

did.unittitle: Letter from James Fenimore Cooper to Charles Gosselin 2 May 1832

scopecontent.p: Cooper to Charles Gosselin, letter of condolence. This is not found in James Franklin Beard's Letters and Journals of James Fenimore Cooper.

did.unittitle: Letter from James Fenimore Cooper to Messrs. Cowdin, Allen, etc. 15 November 1845

scopecontent.p: Cooper to Messrs. Cowdin, Allen, etc., regarding his refusal to lecture to a Cambridge, Mass. society. This is not found in James Franklin Beard's Letters and Journals of James Fenimore Cooper.
